name: Mighty Tactical Shooter : A Turn-Based Shoot 'Em Up
name_original: Mighty Tactical Shooter : A Turn-Based Shoot 'Em Up
description:
Mighty Tactical Shooter : A Turn-Based Shoot 'Em Up is an arcade game developed by Sock Thuggery.
Mighty Tactical Shooter : A Turn-Based Shoot 'Em Up is available on PS Vita, Android, Classic Macintosh and iOS.
Nobuo Uematsu scored the game.
